translation: This, which has been taught to you, is wisdom concerning Sankhya. Now listen to wisdom concerning Yoga, endowed with which, O Arjuna, you shall cast off the bonds of action.
commentary: 2.39 This this? They to thee? Abhihita (is) declared? Numbers in Numbers? Intelligence: wisdom? Yoge in the Yoga? You indeed? Imam this? hear hear? Buddhya with wisdom? equipped endowed with? Yaya which? Partha O Partha? Karmabandham bondage of Karma? prahasyasi (thou) shalt cast off.Commentary Lord Krishna taught Jnana (knowledge) to Arjuna till now. (Sankhya Yoga is the path of Vedanta or Jnana Yoga? which treats
